{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qdescription: A brief description of the feature.\\E$"}
{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qhistory: A longer full history of the feature, this should be written in Markdown and copied from a file in the \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q directory.\\E$"}

{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qstart_year: A date (when a business opened, when some art got installed, etc.)\\E$"}

{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qimg_attribution: Attribution string for the image.\\E$"}
{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qauthor: Who wrote the feature.\\E$"}
{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qsummary: not currently used, could be similar to description.\\E$"}
